item.title: O
item.description: score:210 Chances: Realty Income Corp. (O) is one of the monthly dividend payers offering consistent and predictable cash flow from operations. The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) suggests adding Realty Income Corp. (O) to one’s portfolio. Income stocks, including Realty Income Corp. (O), are expected to have a two-pronged tailwind in 2024.
